trans-unit.source: used for a particular database is stored as part of the database file header at a well-known offset within the first 100 bytes of the file. Almost all read and write operations performed by SQLite on database files are done on blocks of data

trans-unit.source: where ? in the above is replaced with the value of the

where N is the number of pages of data to merge within each invocation of the merge command. The application should stop invoking merge when the difference in the value returned by the sqlite3_total_changes() function before and after the merge command drops to below two. The merge commands may be issued as part of the same or separate transactions, and by the same or different database clients. Refer to the documentation for the merge command for further details.
trans-unit.target: 其中N是在合并命令的每次调用中要合并的数据页数。当合并命令前后sqlite3_total_changes（）函数返回的值的差降至两个以下时，应用程序应停止调用合并。合并命令可以作为相同或独立事务的一部分，并由相同或不同的数据库客户端发出。有关更多详细信息，请参考merge命令的文档。

trans-unit.source: where OP is =, <, <=, >, or >=. The particular operator is stored in aConstraint[].op using one of the SQLITE_INDEX_CONSTRAINT_ values. The index of the column is stored in aConstraint[].iColumn. aConstraint[].usable is TRUE if the expr on the right-hand side can be evaluated (and thus the constraint is usable) and false if it cannot.
trans-unit.target: 其中OP是=，<，<=，>或> =。使用SQLITE_INDEX_CONSTRAINT_值之一将特定运算符存储在aConstraint [] 。op中。列的索引存储在aConstraint []。iColumn中。如果可以评估右侧的expr（因此约束可用），则aConstraint []。usable为TRUE，否则为false。

trans-unit.source: with $p set to a phrase equivalent to the phrase iPhrase of the current query is executed. Any column filter that applies to phrase iPhrase of the current query is included in $p. For each row visited, the callback function passed as the fourth argument is invoked. The context and API objects passed to the callback function may be used to access the properties of each matched row. Invoking Api.xUserData() returns a copy of the pointer passed as the third argument to pUserData.
trans-unit.target: 并将$p设置为相当于当前查询的短语iPhrase的短语。任何适用于当前查询的短语iPhrase的列过滤器都包含在$p中。对于每一条被访问的记录,作为第四个参数传递的回调函数被调用。传递给回调函数的上下文和API对象可以用来访问每个匹配行的属性。调用Api.xUserData()会返回作为第三个参数传递给pUserData的指针的副本。

trans-unit.source: with modified content for which it is not yet safe to update the database file with. It is not safe to update a database file with a buffered write if a power or system failure that occurs during or soon after the update may cause the database to become corrupt following system recovery, according to the assumptions made in section
trans-unit.target: 的修改内容,而更新数据库文件还不安全。如果在更新过程中或更新后不久发生电源或系统故障,可能会导致数据库在系统恢复后损坏,那么使用缓冲写入更新数据库文件是不安全的,根据第3章中的假设。

trans-unit.source: within a group. String and BLOB values that do not look like numbers are interpreted as 0. The result of avg() is always a floating point value as long as at there is at least one non-NULL input even if all inputs are integers. The result of avg() is NULL if and only if there are no non-NULL inputs.
trans-unit.target: 在一个组中。即使所有的输入都是整数,只要至少有一个非NULL输入,avg()的结果总是一个浮点值。如果且仅当没有非NULL输入时,avg()的结果是NULL。

trans-unit.source: works in SQLite the same as it does in ANSI-C.
would be *hellp*. The LIKE and GLOB optimizations consist of adding two virtual terms like this:
trans-unit.target: 将是*hellp*。LIKE和GLOB的优化包括增加这样两个虚拟项。

trans-unit.source: written to the start of it using a single call to the file handles xWrite method.
trans-unit.target: 使用一次对文件句柄xWrite方法的调用将其写入到它的开头。

trans-unit.source: xLock() increases the lock. xUnlock() decreases the lock. The xCheckReservedLock() method checks whether any database connection, either in this process or in some other process, is holding a RESERVED, PENDING, or EXCLUSIVE lock on the file. It returns true if such a lock exists and false otherwise.
trans-unit.target: xLock()增加锁。 xUnlock()减少锁。xCheckReservedLock()方法检查任何数据库连接,无论是在这个进程中还是在其他进程中,是否在文件上持有一个 RESERVED、PENDING 或 EXCLUSIVE 锁。如果存在这样的锁,它返回true,否则返回false。

trans-unit.source: xMutexInit() must not use SQLite memory allocation (sqlite3_malloc() and its associates). Similarly, xMutexAlloc() must not use SQLite memory allocation for a static mutex. However xMutexAlloc() may use SQLite memory allocation for a fast or recursive mutex.
trans-unit.target: xMutexInit（）不得使用SQLite内存分配（sqlite3_malloc（）及其关联）。同样，xMutexAlloc（）不得为静态互斥使用SQLite内存分配。但是xMutexAlloc（）可以将SQLite内存分配用于快速或递归互斥体。

trans-unit.source: xMutexInit() must not use SQLite memory allocation (sqlite3_malloc() and its associates). Similarly, xMutexAlloc() must not use SQLite memory allocation for a static mutex. However xMutexAlloc() may use SQLite memory allocation for a fast or recursive mutex.
trans-unit.target: xMutexInit（）不得使用SQLite内存分配（sqlite3_malloc（）及其关联）。同样，xMutexAlloc（）不得为静态互斥使用SQLite内存分配。但是xMutexAlloc（）可以将SQLite内存分配用于快速或递归互斥体。

trans-unit.source: xSize should return the allocated size of a memory allocation previously obtained from xMalloc or xRealloc. The allocated size is always at least as big as the requested size but may be larger.
trans-unit.target: xSize 应该返回之前从 xMalloc 或 xRealloc 获得的内存分配的分配大小。分配的大小总是至少和请求的大小一样大,但可能更大。

trans-unit.source: xUnpin() is called by SQLite with a pointer to a currently pinned page as its second argument. If the third parameter, discard, is non-zero, then the page must be evicted from the cache. If the discard parameter is zero, then the page may be discarded or retained at the discretion of page cache implementation. The page cache implementation may choose to evict unpinned pages at any time.
trans-unit.target: xUnpin()是由SQLite调用的,它的第二个参数是一个指向当前被钉住的页面的指针。如果第三个参数 discard 为非零,那么该页必须从缓存中被驱逐。如果 discard 参数为零,那么页面可以被丢弃或保留,由页面缓存实现决定。页面缓存实现可以在任何时候选择驱逐未钉入的页面。
